features.title: Features
features.description: Discover the amazing features we offer to enhance your experience. From user-friendly interfaces to powerful tools, we have it all.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Quickly build an effective pricing table for your potential customers with this Bootstrap example. It’s built with default Bootstrap components and utilities with little customization.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: We're here to help. Feel free to reach out to us through our contact form or our email. We'd love to hear from you!
